intro: Lead a customizable dwarf legion in an auto-battle roguelike of glory, death & loot.
description:
Command a fearless band of dwarves in a roguelike auto-battler filled with chaos, strategy, and loot. Every run challenges your tactics as you recruit, equip, and position your squad against waves of enemies that grow stronger with every battle. Glory, death, and loot await those who dare to lead.

Build your legion of dwarves
Recruit and customize up to ten unique dwarves, each with their own class, stats, and abilities. Create powerful synergies by mixing tanks, assassins, healers, and mages. Every item and formation choice can decide victory or defeat.

Strategize before the battle begins
Your dwarves fight automatically, but the outcome depends on your preparation. Arrange your formation, manage your resources, and pick upgrades that complement your team’s strengths. The right setup is the difference between triumph and a total wipeout.

Gather gear and legendary loot
Collect weapons, armor, and accessories after every encounter. Upgrade your heroes, craft new builds, and experiment with combinations to discover deadly strategies.

Master the roguelike loop
Each run is a fresh challenge. Choose your rewards, face unpredictable enemies, and push deeper for greater treasures. Even failure brings progress as you unlock new dwarves, skills, and permanent upgrades.

Face growing threats
Battle orcs, trolls, dragons, and countless monsters across varied stages. Adapt to enemy types and evolve your strategy with each run.

Easy to play, hard to master
With one-tap controls and endless strategic depth, Dwarves: Glory & Loot is a game for players who love tactical thinking, build experimentation, and the thrill of progression.

Lead your dwarves to glory, embrace the chaos, and claim your loot.
